Package de.rwth_aachen.itc.jflashcard

Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rwth_aachen.itc.jflashcard.FileHandler
  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles file and directory actions. The tasks of this class are:
    • Get file name and path,
    • Get the path only,
    • Create a new group (aka new XML file).
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0.1, 2019-09-28
    Author:
    Timöttcher, <tim.boettcher2@rwth-aachen.de>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean createGroup​(java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String path)
      Creates an empty file named <group name>.xml to store the flashcard list.
      static java.lang.String[] getGroupFileInfo​(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
      Returns path and group name (with .xml attached).
      static java.lang.String getPath​(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
      Returns the path to a certain directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileHandler

        public FileHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • createGroup

        public static boolean createGroup​(java.lang.String groupName,
                                  java.lang.String path)
        Creates an empty file named <group name>.xml to store the flashcard list.
        Parameters:
        groupName - The name of the group, and thus of the file.
        path - The path to the file.
        Returns:
        True if the file was created successfully, otherwise false.

      • getPath

        public static java.lang.String getPath​(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
        Returns the path to a certain directory. This gets used to make the user select the destination directory of the new group file.
        Parameters:
        shell - The parent window, used to display the directory dialog.
        Returns:
        The path to the directory (without trailing \ or /) or null if the dialog got canceled.

      • getGroupFileInfo

        public static java.lang.String[] getGroupFileInfo​(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
        Returns path and group name (with .xml attached). Used to retrieve the info of a group file, preparing switching to a different group.
        Parameters:
        shell - The parent window, used to display the file dialog.
        Returns:
        An array with element 0 being path, element 1 being the group name or an empty array if the dialog got canceled.
